articles.author: Andrew Jeong, Frances Vinall, Kelsey Ables, Victoria Bisset, Miriam Berger, Noga Tarnopolsky, Marc Fisher, Karla Adam, Lee Powell, Zoeann Murphy, Sammy Westfall, Ben Brasch, Trisha Thadani, Washington Post Staff, Dan Lamothe, Yasmeen Abutaleb, John Hudson, Michael Birnbaum, Susannah George, Sufian Taha
articles.title: Israel-Hamas war live updates and latest Gaza death toll: Macron arrives in Israel - The Washington Post
articles.description: The United States is preparing for a worst-case scenario that more than 600,000 Americans will need to leave the Middle East if the war spreads, The Post reports.

articles.author: Sumanti Sen
articles.title: Indian-American Sikh man beaten to death in New York road-rage attack - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Jasmer Singh was taken to Jamaica Hospital Medical Center after the attack, where he succumbed to his injuries
articles.content: A Indian-American Sikh man, 66, was reportedly beaten to death in aroad-rage attack in Queens, New York, last week. Jasmer Singhs family is now seeking hate-crime charges against the alleged killer.… [+2339 chars]
